ai-patthana24.9:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.9:1.1_0: Not seeing should be given up by seeing.
ai-patthana24.9:2.1_0: doesn’t give up knowing and seeing things that should be given up.
ai-patthana24.9:3.1_0: You should not give up the principle that gives rise to some things.
ai-patthana24.9:4.1_0: You shouldn’t give up some things that should not give up some things.
ai-patthana24.9:5.1_0: Not by seeing, you should give up causes and conditions for the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana24.9:6.1_0: Nor should be given up by dispelling. Not knowing and seeing, the cause should be given up by oneself.
ai-patthana24.9:6.1_2: From the same day forth, may the Buddha see five hundred monks ...
ai-patthana24.9:7.1_0: It should not be given up by developing, doesn’t give up causes and conditions for the sake of developing.
ai-patthana24.9:8.1_0: Nor should be given up by developing.
ai-patthana24.9:8.1_2: From the same day forth, may the Buddha see five hundred monks ...
ai-patthana24.9:10.1_0: (These three discourses should be expanded in brief.)
ai-patthana24.9:11.1_0: For the sake of not for the sake of refuge the teaching and the causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana24.9:12.1_0: Nor causes the reason for the sake of purification by phys for the sake of females.
ai-patthana24.9:12.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the cause or reason for the sake of causes and conditions.
ai-patthana24.9:12.1_2: Nor makes a cause or reason for the sake of contemplation, nor for the sake of causes and reason.
